thumb.title: 【LOID】まだ終わっていない～Ｐａｒａｎｏｉａ～【リミックス曲】
thumb.description: It's a remix of a remix! Should it be called remix-ception? Please listen to the original version of the remix by Kentenshi. It's really good! Also, please listen to Young Girl A by Siinamota. It's the basis of both remixes, and I'd appreciate it if we could all show our respects to Siinamota. Thank you, and I hope you enjoy listening to this! CREDITS: LOID V1A SOLID - Me Paranoia - Kentenshi Young Girl A - Siinamota Midi - Mr.Goofyglasses on Musescore (Extended by me) Image - Me Arranged and edited by me Copyright Disclaimer: - Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for FAIR USE for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statutes that might otherwise be infringing. Non-Profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favour of FAIR USE. I do not claim ownership over the original songs.
